website_summaries.verdict: A compact upright freezer that looks good and makes the most of the interior space while not taking up too much room in your home, or stressing your bank account.
pros: Generates enthusiasm for offering the perfect combination of a compact size with more interior space than expected
cons: Mixed opinions on the noise level it produces when running

customer_reviews.title: I love my MCUF3W2 Magic Chef Freezer (3
customer_reviews.text: I love my MCUF3W2 Magic Chef Freezer (3.0 cu.ft.) It works so well and is very quiet. Since I also purchased the defrost mats there has been no ice build up and I am very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Jeri M. Thrasher

customer_reviews.title: Much needed extra freezer space
customer_reviews.text: Having a side by side refrigerator/freezer, I needed additional freezer space and this freezer is just the right size. It arrived well packaged, no damage, and fit my space perfectly. Added a couple of those freezer defrost pads and a temp. unit and after a few hours, it was good to go. Now I have space to stock up on sale items as well as store my fruits and vegetables harvested from my garden. Excellent unit.
customer_reviews.author: Coffee Lover

customer_reviews.title: Caked in frost
customer_reviews.text: Frost builds up rapidly. Mine is caked in several pounds eating up 1/2 of the freezer space and making it difficult to remove items. And even if you go through the work of defrosting it, it comes right back. The probable reason for frost in any freezer is poorly made seals, and that makes sense because the seals on this one are extremely weak and barely seal at all when you close it. Find one that seals better. It does get pretty cold an it's quiet. But having units with poor seals from day 1 is inexcusable. I want to put food in it not frost.
customer_reviews.author: Shadowbob

customer_reviews.title: Excellent freezer
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Seriously though, I am confounded by people who state this is noisy....mine is anything but noisy. Don't be mislead by those comments...this freezer is quiet and keeps temps exact. We are very happy with this freezer so far. There was an extremely small nick on a corner in the rear but nothing to get my panties in a bunch about.
customer_reviews.author: Shadow

customer_reviews.title: So quiet
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size if you just need a little extra. It is shockingly quiet. As others noted, mine also came dented.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Epstein

customer_reviews.title: Works very well
customer_reviews.text: I really am happy with my Magic Chef freezer. At first, and after letting it set for 4 hours, before plugging it in, it worked for a short time. Then for some reason, it quite working. I unplugged it for a couple days, plugged it back in, and it has been working beautifully ever since. I am ver happy with it now. Giving it only 4 stars, because of the trouble with it at first. I would recommend it to my friends.
customer_reviews.author: Ella

customer_reviews.title: Great little freezer
customer_reviews.text: This was a good buy. I had a 14 cu.ft. upright that died. Didn't need anything that large to replace since the kids are not at home. Mine arrived in good condition, NO dents or scratches. I don't open it often, but the frost build up is minimal. I've had it for 6 months and I haven't had to defrost it yet. It is pretty full. It holds more than I thought it would.
customer_reviews.author: E.Brown

customer_reviews.title: Freezer pleaser
customer_reviews.text: This little guy has served our purposes well. It freezes everything solid and doesn't appear to add much to our electric bill.
customer_reviews.author: Stanley R. Sloan

customer_reviews.title: Freezes Great
customer_reviews.text: When my laundry room was finally ready to put the freezer in, and it came out of the box, the door edge had a flaw on it. And the only big complaint I have is how quickly the top shelf had ice on it. We used to have a refrigerator size freezer in our laundry room before with no ice problems. And when I am doing laundry, I always leave the door open. But overall, I would 100% say it does a great job, especially for a small freezer.
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Freezer
customer_reviews.text: Great size (not too big, not too small) and works very well in my garage! Allowed me to save some of my food when my refrigerator stopped functioniong properly.
customer_reviews.author: R. A. Summerset

customer_reviews.title: very poor/no customer service
customer_reviews.text: ordered this freezer in early April. came damaged. door doesn't seal properly so freezer builds up ice within a few days and food only halfway freezes. customer service said they would replace it and never did. sent several emails with no response. finally in late July they said they were sending a replacement to be shipped Aug 2 to 8.mid august sent them another email asking about it. 3 days later got an email saying they no longer sold this freezer and would issue a refund. now its Sept 2 and still have heard nothing from them again. I do not recommend this company. if it would let me i would give zero stars!
customer_reviews.author: Atta

customer_reviews.title: Working well
customer_reviews.text: I am using this for my long term food, so I have no problem so far. Everything is solid and no ice build up :)
customer_reviews.author: Violyn

customer_reviews.title: perfect size to suppliment my refigerator
customer_reviews.text: cute little thing. perfect size to suppliment my refigerator freezer
customer_reviews.author: tomato picker

customer_reviews.title: Great freezer
customer_reviews.text: Like the front opening able to see what's in it better.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: came without damage from Bison
customer_reviews.text: So far its been on for two weeks. Very satisfied with product and performance. Simple, clean lines and does what I need. Will see if it lasts.
customer_reviews.author: nonyer bizness

customer_reviews.title: Magic Freezer is outstanding.
customer_reviews.text: The small freezer was excellent. We needed it to expand during the COVID 19 crises. The delivery came earlier then expected and there was no damage in the packaging. We could not be happier with this product from Magic. We highly recommend it for anyone needing any extra small freezer.
customer_reviews.author: Robert C. Warner

customer_reviews.title: Never worked! Stayed above 50 degrees.
customer_reviews.text: Both of the white plastic protectors for the shelves were broken on one end. Plus Freezer didn't work. Never got below 50 degrees. Good customer service, professional.
customer_reviews.author: Janice

customer_reviews.title: Freezer
customer_reviews.text: What can I say, it is a freezer. It does the job I needed it for. The reason for the 4 stars is no delivery notification for some reason.
customer_reviews.author: Chanel Quirk

customer_reviews.title: Noisy & shipped dented.
customer_reviews.text: Too noisy to be kept in a house for sure and the frost buildup is tremendous The unit also came dented on the side. Should have returned it but I need it for Covid-19 food storage.
customer_reviews.author: RW285

customer_reviews.title: Very useful. Works great
customer_reviews.text: I purchased it to store my breast milk. It is a great product. Very useful. No frosting. No noise. Very spacious. And reasonable cost. Worked great for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quiet and so much room.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size and quiet. I originally had half this size and due to the compressor basically had no room and it was noisey. So when the smaller freezer died I purchased this size. WOW! Now I fit so much more items. The bottom area wraps around the compressor so I can fit longer items. The freezer coils are integrated to the FIXED shelves. This helps to evenly freeze throughout the freezer. This thing is so quiet I sometimes think that it's not working. I am truly amazed to how much I can fit in this size. I highly recommend it. And you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: chikiBABY

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good!
customer_reviews.text: Product was delivered in excellent condition and is working exactly as advertised. Excellent size and very quiet. Bought a lot of extra frozen food due to the pandemic and this unit is working out great in my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Michael N.

customer_reviews.title: Died after a few mothns
customer_reviews.text: Just quit on us after a few months of use. Sort of works as a fridge now, but freezes nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Oliver Jones

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Freezer NEVER worked. Oil had leaked all in shipping container. Possible damage during shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Florence Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Good back-up freezer. Quiet and efficient, at least out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: The Town Caller

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Size is perfect - keeps things frozen no problem what so ever
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I bought this freezer as an overflow for the refrigerator freezer. The size is perfect to handle that need.
customer_reviews.author: R. Lutz

customer_reviews.title: Fits in any small space and freezes perfectly, no complaints 😊
customer_reviews.text: I love this freezer, small but roomy inside. I am very happy with my freezer.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Montalvo

customer_reviews.title: It works great.
customer_reviews.text: Works great and has not raised my electric bill! Winner.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Cherven

customer_reviews.title: a perfect fit for our needs
customer_reviews.text: This freezer was just as I had expected ... a perfect fit for our needs.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Holly

customer_reviews.title: Great for a little extra freezer room
customer_reviews.text: We keep this in the garage of the duplex we're currently renting to handle the overflow from the kitchen freezer. Heavy but it works great, no more late night trips to the store for ice cream and more ice
customer_reviews.author: julimonster

customer_reviews.title: Meh. The freezer arrived with a missing leg and ...
customer_reviews.text: Meh. The freezer arrived with a missing leg and the door does not close / seal completely so ice builds up.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Wiig

customer_reviews.title: Works fine, makes noise
customer_reviews.text: I needed extra freezer space for homemade batches of stock, etc., and I bought this new and boxed for less than $100 in a sale at a local store. It works fine and has not accumulated much frost. I was originally planning to put it in my kitchen, but my bedroom door opens into the kitchen and the freezer makes ringing and chattering noises that I could hear at night. Not especially loud, but annoying, so it is now in my walk-in pantry. It was a bargain and I have absolutely no complaints, but I think I would be less happy if I had paid the current price.
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: Does not work
customer_reviews.text: After less than two months, this "freezer" turned into a half-baked "icebox" the only thing keeping the inside cold was the (not anymore) frozen (and now disposable) food I packed it with once it became (briefly!) cold inside.
customer_reviews.author: G. Corrigan

customer_reviews.title: but so far it has been great..
customer_reviews.text: We only have it for a month now, but so far it has been great.....keeps everything frozen and not much ice build up if any, although truth be, it's used for overflow of food so we don't go to it often. Its very quiet and not a bad looking unit!! Glad I bought this one!! JM
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Compact size
customer_reviews.text: Compared mall kitchen.to my old big freezer it is easier to find "old items" and takes up much less space in my s
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Fahling

product_meta.title: Magic Chef MCPMCUF3W2 MCUF3W2 Freezer, 3.0 cu. ft, White
product_meta.description: Color:WhiteThe Magic Chef 3.0 cu. ft. upright freezer gives you the extra frozen food storage space you're looking for. It is perfect for smaller spaces, especially in apartments, office break rooms, vacation condos and mobile homes. Two wire shelves provide easy organization for your frozen foods. Plus, the reversible door and flush-back design offers placement flexibility for any compact space.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars77 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
